documents.document: Holy shit the new @powertriptx album rips HARD. Can't wait for my PO to arrive.
One week until I'm back at @STXIIITATTOO getting started on my next piece. 7/8 months is far too long.
Shout out to @kalpenn who responded to racism by helping to raise almost $600,000 (and still climbing) for refugees.
Microsoft OneDrive is proof that the devil exists.
@weakenednachos https://t.co/ogq6AdosHU This video, forever.
Grabbed my copy of the new @powertriptx album from #greenhell (shout out to Google translate).
First track off the new @Convergecult "Jane Live" album blew me away. Go grab it from @deathwishinc (I ordered the @aperfectmonster edition)
Enjoyed the first 2 episodes of #Backstrom, viva @rainnwilson
@MattZionWE the sad thing is its not even that surprising/shocking when the news breaks, we're becoming desensitised.
This month I'll be seeing @TDEP_ and @the_oathbreaker live. So excited for this song in particular... https://t.co/E0nBiZZ2cv
Just watched #YogaHosers by @ThatKevinSmith. A solid film about sausage-based nazi clones.
New @BWPCULT track is a nice mix of Sleep Paralysis/TROAE imo. Haven't been this excited for a BWP album in years. #riffsfordays
My decision whether to see @everytimeidie or @Borisheavyrocks on Sunday has been made for me by not being able to afford the bus fare.
Saw that a local shop sells whole durian fruit. @WrecklessEating if you come to Edinburgh I've got you.
Got some sweet @BandofNOTHING goodies through my door this morning. https://t.co/gM5oi1eni2
Now that @netflix has adapted "Dirk Gently" into a great TV series, please do an adaptation of The Hitchhikers guide to replace the film.
@HaydenSneku @rolotomassiband @holyroarrecords Awesome, hopefully mine should be waiting for me on Monday.
"Accidentally" ordered a set of Force Wheels and some new bearings from @SkateHut. Damn you @AndySchrock for your slick marketing.
Grabbed my @aof_official - crisis repress from @dinealonemusic. Excellent.
When you find out your old, favourite pair of @drmartens are starting to fall apart. #crushed
Stoked I was able to pick up the @dinealonemusic repress of @cityandcolour - Bring Me Your Love, all hail Dallas Green.
@rhodgilbertshow Finally found out what a tog is: https://t.co/Hfz5ZPJsd4
@invadauk just the blue splatter that I've seen.
@rrusa Will Iowa ever be repressed on vinyl? I'd rather not have to sell an organ to buy a copy.
It's depressing that so many people seemingly buy records just to flip. @invadauk Stranger Things copies selling for $100+. Fuck people.
Last night I had a dream that first press @BlackSabbath records were too expensive on @discogs. My vinyl addiction is getting out of hand.
@ANDYC_ram @LIQUIDROOMS If you drop anything from "Travel the Galaxy", that would be perfect.
@liannew_ It's true, detoxing is what your liver and kidneys are for, but people will try anything I guess.
Breaking from tradition and off to see @ANDYC_ram tonight at @LIQUIDROOMS. Last time I saw him was at Glastonbury, should be excellent!
Got a shipping notification for Stranger Things Vol. 1 from. @invadauk today. So excited.
Today, I gave the new Merzbow/Sun Ra album a listen... I don't get it. Guess I'm not edgy enough.
At least if Trump wins, we'll get to test out @iamjohnoliver's "time-travelling assassin" theory...
Finally managed to grab a copy of Bastions - Hospital Corners on vinyl. Absolute UK hardcore classic.
How about a nice meal of fishy vomit? #planetearth2
@RoySocChem fireworks may look pretty but if someone in the lab asked me to set fire to some metal perchlorates, I'd politely decline.
Penguin dad to the rescue! #planetearth2
This bird is the complete opposite of that penguin harlot. Top lad #planetearth2
Jesus Christ that's a lot of snakes #nope
And just like that, the nation is reunited by cheering on for the little guy #planetearth #golizardgo
Getting up before 7 on a weekend is not something I ever saw in my future.
There's no way you'll be more motivated to work (without drugs) than when you're blasting @dillingerescpln - Calculating Infinity.
I was disappointed to find that r/UKHardcore was not what I hoped it would be.
@rosie_23 pretty sure I shared some photos in our group chat.
@lityerses Maybe. If so, hi mum! Hopefully having her on Facebook keeps her from branching out into other forms of social media.
Every day I think "Today will be the day I tell my parents I got my hands and fingers tattooed" and every day I avoid it.
Finally giving the @Svalbardband discography remaster a listen, despite owning the record for a few days. Awesome. https://t.co/F8wW4koJ9p
@WrecklessEating so much vomit. Also, did Sean pour one out for "Haroomba"?
@WrecklessEating Just watched the new main show. Wow.
Not even Christmas compares to that feeling when an urgently needed, long-awaited reagent arrives. #RealTimeChem
Ash vs Evil Dead blatantly ripping off Christine, but who can complain?
19 years ago @offspring unknowingly released a song that accurately describes Trump's presidential campaign https://t.co/kk0D3O49Q1
Watched the first three episodes of #Frequency on @NetflixUK today, definitely recommended!
@invadauk that is AWESOME.
@invadauk Will the @blackmirror score get a physical release, and will copies of the @dontbreathe soundtrack be available through you?
As one of the few people who's actually a fan of the "found footage horror" genre, I'm impatient to watch the next few @AHSFX episodes
Having to re-optimise reaction conditions for half of the substrates is not ideal #RealTimeChem
Trekked down to London this weekend to see @weakenednachos for the first and only time before they split. Totally fucking worth it.
@jones1lorretta oh nice. I'm glad someone else loves this show. Dat @mogwaiband soundtrack though.
Just seen that The Returned is on Netflix. Can finally get round to watching season 2. Don't watch the English-language version, garbage.
Hair Cake definitely takes me back to the absolute classic Jackass skit, the vomit omlette by Chef Dave.
Just watched Hair Cake (a la @FilthyFrank) for the first time. From all the vomit alert reaction vids youtubers must have weak stomachs.
@Vapable Will all delivery be by UPS now?
@UPS Your "My Choice" website is the absolute worst. Despite all my profile details matching delivery info I cannot change the address.
Just collected a record from the depot that I'm very excited to add to my collection: Sunn O))) Live in Russia 3LP. #EndlessDrone
Speaking of Wear Your Wounds, how good was the Revelator split? Right?
The only way that @the_oathbreaker - Rheia may not be my AOTY is if Bannon finally releases the #wearyourwounds LP. Such anticipation.
Finally rewatched This is the End, so good. If I could dance, in heaven, with @Sethrogen to "Backstreet's Back" that'd be tight.
#LowTeens is a tastefully mathy album full of glorious riffs. Every Time I Die never disappoint.
@WrecklessEating Go home Matt, you're drunk. How long til the next 60 in 60/100 in 100 are on patreon?
The intro is a 15 minute fart joke.
It's nice to know that Daniel Radcliffe's acting career hasn't gone to shit post-Potter. "Swiss Army Man" is immature and hilarious.
In a parallel universe without @souljaboy, the only difference would be that a generation of teens wouldn't know how to "superman" a woman.
If adulthood is napping and moaning about younger people & pop culture, then I'm adulting like a pro.
Weird how going to bed early becomes the more enjoyable the older I get. Is that a thing?
Was planning on crashing out an hour ago (#punx) but ended up watching @TEDBARRUS and @WrecklessEating videos on YouTube. Weirdly addictive.
How long before my previous tweet is the subject of a buzzfeed article?
@KrisWould I could definitely get into that.
Things I don't understand: "dabbing". Seriously. What?
Busy week of #chemistry ahead, supervising an MChem student and trying to get the last bits of data ready for a communication. #TheStruggle
Very happy to wake up to the first cold morning of September. Bring on autumn.
What other bands would do well on a dollars per Decibel ranking? @BandofNOTHING, @myMotorhead, The Body?
A unit of dollars per decibel would be a good way to describe their earnings too.
I've gotta hand it to Sunn O))), if we imagine a fiscal unit of dollars per note per minute at a live show, they're very efficient earners.
@on_lothianbuses can you please run more 25 buses at peak times. For those of us that live closer to @HeriotWattUni it's ridiculous.
If I had tits, @BandofNOTHING would have blown them off last night. Max volume = max enjoyment.
@invadauk Has the newsletter gone out? I've been refreshing my email for the last hour to no avail.
@MondoNews Apologies if I'm being impatient, but are the suicide squad prints shipping yet? The email I got said 3-4 weeks? Cheers!
It's embarrassing to say as a @Convergecult fanboy but I didn't really rate You Fail Me before I bought this redux. https://t.co/ezx3THzScB
Yet another perfect track from @the_oathbreaker.
I just heard the cover of Sweet Leaf that @PRIMITIVEMANE did. So good. #PraiseIommi
Words cannot describe how excited I am for the new @the_oathbreaker album I am.
Email from @sargenthouse to say my bid on a @RussianCircles test press was accepted. Today turned out awesome.
Man, We Never Learned to Live and @employedtoserve were on point tonight in Glasgow. #riffsfordays
@f4oxigen but does that show its O2 or O4? 1000ppm O4 is enough to measure a mass spectrum for conclusive proof
@f4oxigen what proof do you have that your drink contains O4? Do you have mass spectrometry or absorption spectroscopy data?
Today I found out I can buy @reviveskate1 and force gear at @SkateHut. Life is good.
That said, he is an absolute national treasure and one of the few celebrities we mourn leaving us, unlike Piers or fucking James Corden.
One bad thing about Last Week Tonight w/ @iamjohnoliver is idiots can now share his videos on Facebook to give the Illusion of intelligence.
Every day on the bus home from @HeriotWattUni I go past a biscuit factory and it smells exactly as heavenly as you'd think.
If you're ever feeling down and out, go on r/drugs and you'll def find a post from someone high as balls telling you how special you are.
